audioJson.name: Tefifon
audioJson.capacity:
Small: 18 minutes
Medium: 1 hour
Large: 4 hours
audioJson.fact1: This format used an endless loop plastic band onto which grooves were engraved and played back with a stylus
audioJson.fact2: Players were available as standalone devices or combined with radios
audioJson.fact3:
This format's sound quality
was higher than Gramophone
discs, but not Microgroove discs
